taxon.author: Logunov & Marusik, 1998
taxon.distribution: Russia (Urals to north-eastern Siberia), Mongolia, China

referenceObject.reference: Logunov, D. V. & Marusik, Y. M. (1998). A new species of the genus Xysticus from the mountains of south Siberia and Mongolia (Araneae, Thomisidae). Bulletin of the British Arachnological Society 11: 103-106.
